about_the_game:
As the Five Elements Seal is broken, time and space are in chaos, and a deeper darkness has enveloped the Realm of Divinity. In this brand-new DLC "Dark Invasion," over 30 new NPCs have arrived, each bringing new mechanics and stories.

Among them, famous characters from Journey to the West such as Golden Robe, Nine Spirit Lion, and Six-Eared Macaque joined the game.

There are also eye-catching female NPCs such as White Fox, White Deer, and Snake Queen, as well as the God of Land who manages the camp, the God of the Hearth, and the Black Market Merchant who appears one after another.

Under the control of the Omen, the demonized avatars of each companion also appear one after another, making the situation extremely difficult.

You will also meet different versions of Wukong, the Swine King, Holy Monk, and a mysterious girl from another world.

Lastly, the DLC also includes a brand-new Holy Monk's skin. Come and give it a try!

Please note that the English version is currently unavailable. We are actively working on the English localization and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please stay tuned for future announcements!
detailed_description:
As the Five Elements Seal is broken, time and space are in chaos, and a deeper darkness has enveloped the Realm of Divinity. In this brand-new DLC "Dark Invasion," over 30 new NPCs have arrived, each bringing new mechanics and stories.

Among them, famous characters from Journey to the West such as Golden Robe, Nine Spirit Lion, and Six-Eared Macaque joined the game.

There are also eye-catching female NPCs such as White Fox, White Deer, and Snake Queen, as well as the God of Land who manages the camp, the God of the Hearth, and the Black Market Merchant who appears one after another.

Under the control of the Omen, the demonized avatars of each companion also appear one after another, making the situation extremely difficult.

You will also meet different versions of Wukong, the Swine King, Holy Monk, and a mysterious girl from another world.

Lastly, the DLC also includes a brand-new Holy Monk's skin. Come and give it a try!

Please note that the English version is currently unavailable. We are actively working on the English localization and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please stay tuned for future announcements!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10 or above
  • Processor: 2 GHz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.15 or above
  • Processor: 3 GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHZ or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or OpenGL 4.0 compatible or above

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 3 GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or OpenGL 4.1 compatible or above
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
